snippet: Prosecutors said a Queens man was stopped just days before he and two of his former high school classmates planned to stage suicide attacks.
abstract: Federal jury convicts Adis Medunjanin on a host of terrorism charges in connection with a plot to bomb New York City subways; Medunjanin, naturalized US citizen born in Bosnia, went to Pakistan with two high school friends to fight American troops in Afghanistan, but was instead recruited by Al Qaeda, and returned to the US to carry out an act of terrorism; Medunjanin faces life sentence at September sentencing.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said a Queens man was stopped just days before he and two of his former high school classmates planned to stage suicide attacks.

headline.seo: Terror Defendant Convicted in Plot to Bomb New York Subways
headline.main: Terror Defendant Convicted in New York Subway Plot
headline.print_headline: Jury Convicts U.S. Citizen in Plot to Bomb City’s Subways
